Name: Bandit
Desc: A thief, thug, outlaw, or other miscreant.
Prompts:
• Armed with stolen or crude weapons
  • Greedy, desperate, or afraid
  • Dirty tricks and quick escapes

Name: Impeded
Desc: A sense or faculty you normally depend on has been temporarily lost.
Prompts:
• Temporarily blind or deaf
  • Mute or unable to communicate
  • Spellcasting or other special quality
Rule: Discard by spending downtime attending to the condition.

Name: Broken
Desc: Vital gear you depend on is unavailable and must be replaced
Prompts:
• Nothing left but scrap
  • Spellbook lost or unreadable
  • Magical tools disenchanted
Rule: Discard by spending downtime attending to the condition.

Name: Transformed
Desc: You've been physically remade into something new, but not forever.
Prompts:
• Polymorphed into an animal
  • Changed into a monster
  • Zombified
Rule: Discard by spending downtime attending to the condition.

Name: Cursed
Desc: A powerful and baneful magic has you in its grip.
Prompts:
• Geases or other powerful compulsions
  • Unbreakable or complex taboos
  • Pain or great misfortune
Rule: Discard by spending downtime attending to the condition.

Name: Pursued
Desc: You're being chased, by someone or something that wishes you ill.
Prompts:
• Forced to hide from searchers
  • Risk of imminent attacks
  • Threat to current goals
Rule: Discard by spending downtime attending to the condition.

Name: Indebted
Desc: You have significant debts that demand your time or attention.
Prompts:
• Pursuit by patron
  • Attention from powerful forces
  • Bad reputation
Rule: Discard by spending downtime attending to the condition.

Name: Exhausted
Desc: Every step is an effort. You need not just rest, but healing.
Prompts:
• Ongoing lack of rest
  • Disease or infection
  • Fever or delirium
Rule: Discard by spending downtime attending to the condition.

Name: Wounded
Desc: Your injuries are severe. You must get medical attention soon.
Prompts:
• Significant blood loss
  • Broken or twisted limbs
  • Shock or disorientation
Rule: Discard by spending downtime attending to the condition.

Name: Condition Examples
Desc: Conditions are a way to achieve success at a cost. You can use conditions in many ways.
Prompts:
• You choose to take Disarmed to score a telling blow on the enemy.
  • The facilitator or another player thinks touching the idol will leave you Magicked.
  • A poisonous cloud envelops you. If you want to stay in it, meet the challenge by taking Weakened, otherwise you must leave the cloud.
  • You're already Hurt, but you can worsen it to Wounded to get a hit. You attack, blood gushing from reopened wounds, and strike down your enemy before falling in a faint yourself.
  • You spend a scene being healed by a priestess to discard Hurt. You wanted to talk to her anyway, about...
  • You spend a week of downtime doing odd jobs to pay off Indebted. During that time, you listen for new adventure opportunities.
Rule: Flip to see rules

Name: Character Cards
Desc:
Cards with this icon are character cards.

These cards describe a PC's most important traits.

To create a new PC, pick three cards.
Prompts:
• Topside: get a hit by flipping the card
  • Flipside: flip when a prompt is narrated by anyone

Name: Synthesist
Desc: What or who will you unmake, in your goal of making something new?
Prompts:
• Tear down something valuable or important
  • Keep something going at great cost
  • Overuse the same solution

Name: Soldier
Desc: Life is pain. There's no reward for this, only the next battle. When will you fall?
Prompts:
• Lash out at an easy target
  • Use your power selfishly
  • Dismiss the peaceful alternative

Name: Quester
Desc: That which is greater than you can also crush you beneath it.
Prompts:
• Waver in your dedication to your quest
  • Shut others out of assisting you
  • Put your quest before more mundane matters

Name: Performer
Desc: When anything you say matters, will you say the wrong thing, or for the wrong reasons?
Prompts:
• Show up or embarrass someone important
  • Draw unwanted attention
  • Provoke an unintended reaction

Name: Opportunist
Desc: There's only so much good luck to go around. Will you run out of yours, or take someone else's away?
Prompts:
• Kick someone when they're down
  • Betray a trust
  • Let someone else pay the price

Name: Monster
Desc: To be the thing they say you are. How easy to do it accidentally. How tempting to choose it.
Prompts:
• Make everything worse for yourself or an ally
  • Fall prey to your darkness
  • Spark conflict or dissent

Name: Guardian
Desc: You control that which depends on you, and sometimes the weight grows too much.
Prompts:
• Assert your authority
  • Cast suspicion too widely
  • Shut down your feelings or shut out your charge

Name: Dreamer
Desc: When the gulf between is and ought becomes too much, which will you choose?
Prompts:
• Reject the real, denounce the realist
  • Forget that you have friends
  • Lose sight of your dream for a time

Name: Scraplander
Desc: They say you're no better than the trash you gather.
Prompts:
• Rush into risk
  • Defy civilization's customs
  • Express a dangerous or weird quirk
  • Subvert the stereotype

Name: Forest Folk
Desc: They say you're creepy and aloof.
Prompts:
• Refuse offers of aid or comfort
  • Bluntly say a hard truth
  • Keep an outsider distant from you
  • Subvert the stereotype

Name: Country Folk
Desc: They look down on you as rustic bumpkins.
Prompts:
• Distrust the sophisticated
  • Ask something everyone else knows
  • Rigidly uphold tradition
  • Subvert the stereotype

Name: City Folk
Desc: They say you've sold your soul to the city.
Prompts:
• Establish dominance through aggression
  • Overvalue the material
  • Take advantage of a relationship
  • Subvert the stereotype

Name: Westerner
Desc: They say you're unreliable or untrustworthy.
Prompts:
• Fail to uphold an obligation
  • Disappoint someone important
  • Disappear when needed
  • Subvert the stereotype

Name: Easterner
Desc: They say you are distant and arrogant.
Prompts:
• Mask your emotions behind politeness
  • Follow your own ways in strange lands
  • Extol the virtues of your own culture
  • Subvert the stereotype

Name: Southerner
Desc: They say the desert has burned weakness out of you.
Prompts:
• Uphold a complex code of honor
  • Make an expedient but cruel choice
  • Stand by your group, right or wrong
  • Subvert the stereotype

Name: Northerner
Desc: They say your heart is frozen.
Prompts:
• Eschew material comfort
  • Act disinterested or distant
  • Distrust an outsider
  • Subvert the stereotype

Name: X-Card
Desc: "And if there is ever an issue, anyone can call for a break and we can talk privately. I know it sounds funny but it will help us play amazing games together and usually I'm the one who uses the X card to protect myself from all of you! Please help make this game fun for everyone. Thank you!"
Rule: Lay this card at the center of the play area

Name: Simple Dice
Desc:
If you need to meet a challenge and have no other way to do so,

or if the outcome ought to be random, you can roll 1d6.
Prompts:
• On 1-3, you don't meet the challenge
  • On 4-6, you get 1 hit
Rule: Flip to not use dice

Name: Challenges
Desc: Resolve challenges strictly via narration.
Rule: Flip to rely on hits

Name: The Facilitator
Desc:
The game has a Facilitator (GM, MC, referee).

Facilitators have final authority over rules questions.

Whoever laid this card face up is the facilitator.
Rule: Flip to play cooperatively

Name: The Game
Desc:
This is a game whose rules are on cards.

To add a rule, write a card.

Follow every rule on the cards on the table.

Name: The Game
Desc:
This is a game whose rules are on cards.

To add a rule, write a card.

Follow every rule on the cards on the table.

Name: The Facilitator
Desc:
This game has no Facilitator (GM, MC, referee).

Resolve player disputes collectively.
Rule: Flip to become the Facilitator

Name: Challenges
Desc:
If any player thinks the outcome of your narration is uncertain, you've been challenged.

Meet the challenge by getting a hit via some other rule.

If you don't, whoever posed the challenge narrates the outcome instead.
Rule: Flip to resolve via narration

Name: Simple Dice
Desc: The Simple Dice rule is not used in this game
Rule: Flip to use Simple Dice

Name: X-Card
Desc: "I'd like your help. Your help to make this game fun for everyone. If anything makes anyone uncomfortable in any way, just lift this card up, or simply tap it. You don't have to explain why. It doesn't matter why. When we lift or tap this card, we simply edit out anything X-Carded."
Rule: Read aloud, then flip this card

Name: Northerner
Desc: Snow-swept peaks and narrow valleys are your home.
Prompts:
• Deal with or take advantage of cold
  • Survive sudden misfortune
  • Bury your emotions and move forward

Name: Southerner
Desc: Fiery deserts and glittering oases are your home.
Prompts:
• Deal with or take advantage of heat
  • Keep going when all seems lost
  • Inspire in the face of hardship

Name: Easterner
Desc: Mysterious mountains and river-lands are your home.
Prompts:
• Work with earth and metal
  • Share the wisdom of past generations
  • Understand unspoken things

Name: Westerner
Desc: Islands, archipelagos, and boats are your home.
Prompts:
• Deal with or take advantage of water
  • Quickly adapt to shifting circumstances
  • Speed away from trouble

Name: City Folk
Desc: Big cities, centers of knowledge and trade, are your home.
Prompts:
• Get around in crowded or complex areas
  • Use a lesson the city taught you
  • Find a guy who knows a guy

Name: Country Folk
Desc: Villages, farms, and manors are your home.
Prompts:
• Work with the land and animals
  • Do what common sense tells you
  • Show hospitality to everyone

Name: Forest Folk
Desc: Trappers' camps and green silences are your home.
Prompts:
• Live and thrive in the wilderness
  • Notice something hidden
  • Find a path to your goal

Name: Scraplander
Desc: Haunted wastelands and blasted heaths are your home.
Prompts:
• Survive through attentiveness and preparation
  • Deal with or take advantage of remnants of old wars and lost magic
  • Reveal a useful item or experience

Name: Dreamer
Desc: Tomorrow beckons, if you can fix today. You can't change the world alone. But you aren't, are you?
Prompts:
• Remind someone of their best self
  • Light a candle to spite the darkness
  • Defy what's possible with what's necessary

Name: Guardian
Desc: You feel responsible for something or someone else. Their need propels you.
Prompts:
• Keep your charge safe from something
  • Identify and monitor a threat
  • Endure the unimaginable

Name: Monster
Desc: Your looks, reputation, or nature cause common folk to fear or reject you.
Prompts:
• Take advantage of others' fears
  • Exploit the source of your monstrousness
  • Make common cause with other monsters

Name: Opportunist
Desc: Life is unpredictable. When an opening comes, seize it. When a chance comes, take it.
Prompts:
• Exploit or create a weakness
  • Employ misdirection or deception
  • Take a risk nobody else would

Name: Performer
Desc: Through actions and words, you entertain, persuade, or transform people around you.
Prompts:
• Embody grace, confidence, or poise
  • Influence people to action
  • Spark or manipulate emotion

Name: Quester
Desc: A vow, an ideal, a promise, a vision, a mission. Something drives you unstoppably onward.
Prompts:
• Live the life your resolve demands
  • Rally others to your cause
  • Find a way forward despite everything

Name: Soldier
Desc: Life is struggle. Everyone has to fight, all the time. What do you fight for?
Prompts:
• Test your fate against an opponent
  • Make a sacrifice to support a hope
  • Stand up when everything says to stay down

Name: Synthesist
Desc: You create, fix, and remix.
Prompts:
• Make something new out of what's available
  • Repair or recreate something
  • Bring creativity to bear against a problem

Name: Character Cards
Desc:
Cards with this icon are character cards.

These cards describe a PC's most important traits.

To create a new PC, pick three cards.
Prompts:
• Topside: get a hit by flipping the card
  • Flipside: flip when a prompt is narrated by anyone

Name: Condition Cards
Desc:
You've been affected by a temporary problem. Injury, delirium, debts, magical curses, and so on are all conditions.

You can choose to take a condition to get a hit. Describe how. Any player offering a challenge can suggest an appropriate condition that meets that challenge.

The condition is true and limits your fictional actions. If you narrate an action the condition would interfere with, you must meet the challenge of the condition in addition to any other challenges.

You can flip a topside condition to worsen it and get another hit. Describe how.

Clearing conditions takes time. Use this time to drive drama, build the world, or explore how you clear the condition.
Rule: Flip to see examples

Name: Hurt
Desc: You've been bloodied, bruised, stunned, or otherwise physically harmed.
Prompts:
• Weapon attacks
  • Creatures' natural attacks
  • Natural disasters
Rule: Flip to worsen the condition and get a hit. Discard by spending a scene attending to the condition.

Name: Weakened
Desc: You've exerted yourself, or been mildly hurt, and need time to rest.
Prompts:
• Fatigue or sleep deprivation
  • Hunger or dehydration
  • Weather or temperature extremes
Rule: Flip to worsen the condition and get a hit. Discard by spending a scene attending to the condition.

Name: Obliged
Desc: You've incurred an important responsibility.
Prompts:
• Patron impatient or asks more
  • Rivals or enemies interfere
  • Embarrassment if revealed
Rule: Flip to worsen the condition and get a hit. Discard by spending a scene attending to the condition.

Name: Wanted
Desc: Someone powerful or dangerous is interested in you.
Prompts:
• Scrutiny from guards, thugs, etc.
  • Someone tailing you
  • Stalked by an animal
Rule: Flip to worsen the condition and get a hit. Discard by spending a scene attending to the condition.

Name: Magicked
Desc: A spell or other power is affecting you.
Prompts:
• Charms, illusions, or other deceptions
  • Taboos or limitations on action
  • Discomfort or distraction
Rule: Flip to worsen the condition and get a hit. Discard by spending a scene attending to the condition.

Name: Mutated
Desc: You've been physically changed by magic or an artifact.
Prompts:
• Animal ears or other features
  • Monstrous modifications
  • Partial petrification or zombification
Rule: Flip to worsen the condition and get a hit. Discard by spending a scene attending to the condition.

Name: Disarmed
Desc: Vital gear you depend on has been damaged or taken
Prompts:
• Blunted or broken blades
  • Damaged or partial armor
  • Malfunctioning magical tools
Rule: Flip to worsen the condition and get a hit. Discard by spending a scene attending to the condition.

Name: Hindered
Desc: A sense or faculty you normally depend on has been weakened due to injury, magic, or stress.
Prompts:
• Unable to clearly see or hear
  • Unable to speak clearly
  • Magical senses or powers unreliable
Rule: Flip to worsen the condition and get a hit. Discard by spending a scene attending to the condition.

Prompts:
• Handles stolen goods
  • Willing to work for coin
  • Cunning and clever
